We are The Roof Construction

Roof offer a outstanding service & work directly with our clients to ensure that projects are delivered to the extreme standard, on time and on budget.

Contact Us
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1497444459819{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Roof has continually focused on maintaining customer relations and building on our philosophy of working together with our clients to produce a competitive and effective package delivery, with a high quality approach.Our project diversity and commitment to quality has allowed us to exceed client needs and expectations.

We accept our responsibility for our employees and other persons who may be affected by our activities. Our services include general contracting, construction management, design build and pre-construction services. For 37 years, we’ve served the construction industry with the same reliable, ethical, award winning service that has made us most trusted contractor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1652863102159{margin-top: 25px !important;margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

US Automation has been offering entire end-to-end solutions for the Surface Finishing Industry for over 25 years, by providing surface finishing equipment, utilities, and associated equipment. The full spectrum of the industry, encompassing components ranging from Knitting Needles to Large Fusellege Components for Aerospace and spanning a wide range of applications such as Aerospace, Automotives, Hardware & Faucets Industry, Electronics, White Goods Industry, and so on. US Automation encourages a culture of continual improvement, as well as Design and Development, in order to give cutting-edge technology and the greatest levels of safety to its customers.

We have a team of engineers who assist us in completing tasks efficiently. These experts can work in any situation and do it in the most cost-effective and practical way possible. Our company’s service engineers assist with installation and provide prompt after-sales service to clients. We manufacture our plating baths with high-grade materials and innovative technology to ensure that they meet international requirements. To be able to supply improved and most recent plating baths, we do significant market research. Our firm’s warehousing section assists us in storing these products in an appropriately methodical and secure manner.

Mr. B. R. Prajapati / Rudra Prajapati, our proprietor, oversees our business activities. He has a wealth of industry knowledge and is well-known for his strong work ethic and business acumen.

  • Top-notch After Sales Services till the consumer is completely satisfied.
    Customer-driven Customization where we can make changes to our products to meet the needs of our customers.
  • Expertise in creating plants that take up the least amount of area.
  • In the surface coating facility, there is a strong foundation and world-class technologies, such as SCADA, solar panels for heating, and a waste heat recovery system (WHRS)
  • Our market brand is the most trusted in surface coating technology.

  • The loyal customer base that keeps coming back.

  • Our team has been taught by the School of Inspirational Leadership to meet commitment through teamwork.
  • We offer environmentally friendly solutions that are also safe.
